Content.Text:
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just taking in the scenery. If you
have the time, <MYNAME>, why don't you
join me?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It really is so beautiful here. I could
stay here forever just enjoying the
view.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I grew up in a place with very little
greenery, after all.
<PAGE>
Having this greenery running all the way
to the horizon, it almost feels like too
much!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know about my past? Okay,
well...
<PAGE>
I'm a orphan. I grew up in an orphanage.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No need to worry. It was actually a nice
place, comfortable, and quite pleasant.
<PAGE>
There were lots of books in the
orphanage, and I would always climb up a
tree and read books until evening.
<PAGE>
I even got so absorbed in a book that I
once fell from the tree!

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You cannot imagine me ever doing that?
I was still just a child, after all.
<PAGE>
Luckily I wasn't hurt especially badly.
The headmaster of the orphanage was
not very pleased with me, of course.
<PAGE>
The headmaster of the orphanage was
always smiling... except for that
day. Such anger, yet such concern.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tell me, <MYNAME>. Your homeland is also
far from here, isn't it?
<PAGE>
Will you tell me a little more about it,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh really? That sounds like a lot of
fun. I'd love to give that a try.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for sharing that wonderful
story with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Talking like this makes me feel so
nostalgic.
<PAGE>
It makes me want to go home, right
away if I could.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But of course that isn't going to
happen. So I've decided to send a letter
home instead.
<PAGE>
I think sharing our current experiences
may allow us to feel like we are still
together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why don't we write our letters together,
then? I will lend you the letterset that
I always use.
<PAGE>
Why don't we take some tea and detail
our lives here?
